content:
While I was practicing my punches, Glenn was tapping on his calculator,
When I was eating, Glenn was still tapping on his calculator,
When I was doing laundry, Glenn was still, still, still tapping...
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
But, but, you know how it is,
the more something's forbidden, the more you want to do it!
So I snuck into the Scripture Library anyway—
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content: <size=30>(Shocked) Wait a sec—did I just say "beat up"?!</size>
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Once I pulled a noodle that stretched 30 meters without breaking,
The noodle shop owner hung it up to dry,
It became the shop's "living billboard."
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
But, but...
Noodles are still best when eaten.
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
You don't necessarily need plum blossom posts for kung fu training,
but then again, punching regular trees
isn't a great idea either - you'll just end up with branches falling on your head.
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
My master once said,
"Never open the blue-covered martial arts manual
on the very top of the third bookshelf from the left
in the Scripture Library."
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Wait, could the Glenn I saw...
<size=64>NOT BE THE REAL GLENN?!</size>
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
To master martial arts, hand strength is crucial.
That's why not long ago, I became an apprentice
at a noodle shop in Metropolis to learn the art of hand-pulling noodles.
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
So it turns out that "Secret Martial Arts Manual"
was actually just...
a snack variety pack with "Secret Martial Arts Manual" printed on it.
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊
